# Security Policy

At blauwfruit, the security of our users and systems is of paramount importance. We appreciate your help in identifying and responsibly disclosing security vulnerabilities.

## Scope

This policy applies to all components of this repository, including all code, systems, and services covered by our contractual agreements with the client. It is intended for use by authorized personnel only.

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability, please report it immediately by contacting our security team. To ensure a prompt and coordinated response, include the following details in your report:

- **Description:** A clear explanation of the vulnerability and its potential impact.
- **Steps to Reproduce:** Detailed steps to reproduce the issue.
- **Severity:** An assessment of the vulnerability's severity.
- **Supporting Information:** Any relevant logs, screenshots, or documentation.

Please send your report to:  
[security@blauwfruit.nl](mailto:security@blauwfruit.nl)

For additional details on our overall vulnerability reporting process, please refer to our public information page:  
[https://blauwfruit.nl/security](https://blauwfruit.nl/security)

## Responsible Disclosure

- **Confidentiality:** Due to the private nature of this repository and our contractual obligations, do not disclose any details of the vulnerability publicly.
- **Timely Resolution:** We are committed to investigating and resolving reported vulnerabilities in accordance with our SLA.

## Our Commitment

- **Prompt Acknowledgment:** We will acknowledge receipt of your report as soon as possible.
- **Confidential Handling:** All reported vulnerabilities will be treated as confidential and handled with the utmost care.

## Legal Notice

This security policy is subject to the terms of our SLA and estimation agreement with the client. Unauthorized disclosure of vulnerability details or other sensitive information may lead to legal consequences.

## Contact

For any questions regarding this security policy or to report a vulnerability, please reach out to us at:  
[security@blauwfruit.nl](mailto:security@blauwfruit.nl)
